p: Researchers conducted by Roberto et al. [ 31] and Seol [ 32] also observed the antioxidant activity of limonene and linalool compounds, noting that they act as regulators of oxidative stress. It is observed the presence of these substances in the chemical composition of the essential oil of T. diversifolia (limonene 5.40% and linalool 0.32%), which could justify the results obtained for this activity.
